query:

  ADD COLUMN engagementAlertSms tinyint DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN abTestResultSms tinyint DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN systemUpdateSms tinyint DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN generalSms tinyint DEFAULT 0
